'''Herugar Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Herugar was the only child of [[Rudigar Bolger]] and [[Belba Baggins]]. He married [[Jessamine Boffin]] and they had one child together, [[Odovacar Bolger|Odovacar]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>
==Etymology==
The name ''Herugar'' means "war-spear".<ref>See names such as [[Herugrim]] and [[Fredegar Bolger|Fredegar]], [[Rudigar Bolger|Rudigar]].</ref>
